title: Anxhela Peristeri, an excellent voice of Albanian music
text:
Anxhela Peristeri, an excellent voice of Albanian music
Anxhela Peristeri is a renowned singer in Albania. She was born on the 24th of March in the southeastern city of KorA�a. She attended the elementary school in her hometown and afterwards she graduated at the Academy of Fine Arts.
After graduation, she moved to Greece, where she studied music. Anxhela Peristeri has participated in many song competitions in our neighboring country.
She recorded her first participation at the annual song festival organized by RTSH in 2001, with the song a�?a�� I Have only youa��a��.
Anxhela Peristeri has a successful career on the Albanian stage. She has participated in many festivals and concerts and is very popular with the Albanian audience.
On 24 March 2014, Anxhela Peristeri returns to Albania.
During her career, she has won numerous awards, including the show a�?a�� A�Your Face Sounds Familiar A�and the music show A�a�?a��C’e la viea��a��.
In 2017, she participated in the song festival, ” Magical Songs”, with the song ” (Crazy), winning first prize.
